summary: This document is an email chain from March 2021 among U.S. prosecutors discussing the drafting of the government's opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's third bail application. It involves coordination with the Office of International Affairs (OIA) regarding legal language concerning France and the UK.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the bail opposition being drafted; she is the accused in the case.

events.title: Drafting of Third Bail Opposition
events.description: U.S. prosecutors are finalizing their opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's third bail application, coordinating with international offices for accuracy on legal points regarding France and the UK.

keyFacts: Prosecutors were drafting an opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's third bail application in March 2021.
The drafting involved coordination with the Office of International Affairs (OIA) regarding legal language pertaining to France and the UK.
The email chain shows internal government review and urgency due to a filing deadline.
The document is heavily redacted, with most sender/recipient names and specific details omitted.
